degrees.instituteName: National Institute of Technology Kurukshetra, Haryana India

description: Conceptualized and built a dynamic admin dashboard utilizing the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack by coordinating with the cross functional team of 5 members
Engineered robust search, filter, and sorting functionalities within the admin dashboard.
Implemented the Context API for flawless global state management across the frontend, enhancing user experience and maintaining consistent data synchronization.
Established a reliable backend environment using Node.js and Express.js, optimizing performance and enabling rapid communication between frontend and database.
Played a pivotal role in the development lifecycle, actively collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Conducted software analysis, programming, testing and debugging. Fixed production and non-production application issues.
